metadata.title: CVE-2021-32280 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in fig2dev before 3.2.8.. A NULL pointerdereference exists in the function compute_closed_spline() located intrans_spline.c. It allows an attacker to cause Denial of Service. The fixedversion of fig2dev is 3.2.8.

criterions.comment: transfig: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xfig: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
